_header: For to prevent / And after repent / It were Folly

CULFf16.First Lines:
ffor to preuenteAnd after repentehyt wer ffolyOther wass
                    then troyth…
CULFf16.Last Lines: …In the westeThat goyth to resteEuerry nyght
